vlive.korean: 내가 좀 감정적이었다고 생각해요? Do you think I was emotional? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 존잘 연하가 선배 꼬시는 법 [엑스엑스(XX)] - EP.05
vlive.english: Do you think I was emotional?

vlive.korean: 알겠습니다, 병찬이는 형이 감정적인 것 같아요? 이성적인 것 같아요? Okay. Byung-chan, what do you think about me? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] VICTON X LieV - 빅톤의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: Okay. Byung-chan, what do you think about me?

vlive.korean: 저도 확실히 이 노래가 되게 감정적으로 그리고... I also felt that the song really touched me... 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 찬이의 "방" 🐺 Ep. 11!
vlive.english: I also felt that the song really touched me...

vlive.korean: 그러니까 저는 감정적이에요. So, I am emotional. 듣기 View video Dispatch : [독점] "그남자 작사, 그남자 작곡"...백호와 범주의 못다한 이야기 (프로듀서 인터뷰 비하인드)
근데 대신에 이제 너무 감정적이여지지 말고. but I need to avoid being too emotional. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] IMFACT X Rooftop Live - 임팩트의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: but I need to avoid being too emotional.

examples.korean: She was touched by the plight of the refugees. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 난민들의 곤경을 보고 감정적이 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was touched by the plight of the refugees. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They made an emotional appeal for help. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 감정적으로 도움을 호소했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They made an emotional appeal for help. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I try not to become emotionally involved. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 감정적으로 휘말리지 않으려고 애쓰고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I try not to become emotionally involved. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He tends to get emotional on these occasions. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 이런 경우에 감정적이 되는 경향이 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He tends to get emotional on these occasions. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You’re too emotionally involved with the situation. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신은 그 상황에 감정적으로 너무 깊이 개입되어 있어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You’re too emotionally involved with the situation. Add to Wordbook
